question.text: Select the incorrect statement about evolution.

options.text: The Dinosaurs were suddenly disappeared from the earth about 65 million years ago.
The first mammals were like shrews.
The Neanderthal man with a brain size of <math><mtext>1400 cc</mtext></math> lived in east and central Africa <math><mtext>75,000-10,000</mtext></math> years ago.
The skull of baby chimpanzee is more like adult human skull.

solution.text: The Neanderthal man with a brain size of <math><mtext>1400 cc</mtext></math> lived in east and central Asia <math><mtext>1,00,000–</mtext></math><math><mtext>40,000</mtext></math> years ago. They used hides to protect their body and buried their dead with flowers and tools. It is believed that they had some religion.
